Repository Secrets:
# AWS Credentials (per environment)
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_DEV
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_DEV
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_STAGING  
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_STAGING
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_PROD
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_PROD

# Databricks Credentials (per environment)
DATABRICKS_HOST_DEV
DATABRICKS_TOKEN_DEV
DATABRICKS_WAREHOUSE_ID_DEV
DATABRICKS_HOST_STAGING
DATABRICKS_TOKEN_STAGING
DATABRICKS_WAREHOUSE_ID_STAGING
DATABRICKS_HOST_PROD
DATABRICKS_TOKEN_PROD
DATABRICKS_WAREHOUSE_ID_PROD

# Notifications
SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL

Repository Variables:
# Project Configuration
PROJECT_NAME=country-currency-pipeline
APP_NAME=country-currency-app

# Environment-specific configurations
CATALOG_NAME_DEV=dev_catalog
SCHEMA_NAME_DEV=country_data_dev
TABLE_NAME_DEV=currency_mapping_dev
VOLUME_NAME_DEV=data_volume_dev

CATALOG_NAME_STAGING=staging_catalog
SCHEMA_NAME_STAGING=country_data_staging
TABLE_NAME_STAGING=currency_mapping_staging
VOLUME_NAME_STAGING=data_volume_staging

CATALOG_NAME_PROD=prod_catalog
SCHEMA_NAME_PROD=country_data
TABLE_NAME_PROD=currency_mapping
VOLUME_NAME_PROD=data_volume

# AWS IAM Roles (per environment)
AWS_ROLE_ARN_DEV=arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/github-actions-dev-role
AWS_ROLE_ARN_STAGING=arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/github-actions-staging-role
AWS_ROLE_ARN_PROD=arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/github-actions-prod-role
